name: Green Mango Salad With Salty-Sweet Grilled Steak
recipeIngredient: 2 Thai bird or other red chilies, chopped, or 2 teaspoons sriracha (Asian chili paste)
1 large or 2 small green mangoes (about 1 1/2 pounds), peeled and thinly sliced, available in Asian markets
1/3 cup torn fresh basil leaves, preferably Asian basil

itemListElement.text: In a shallow dish, combine soy sauce, 1/4 cup water, fish sauce and sugar. Stir until sugar is dissolved. Add steak and set aside to marinate for about 1 hour, turning occasionally.
In a small bowl, combine lime juice, garlic, sugar, chilies, soy sauce and fish sauce.

Drain steak and pat dry. Grill over hot coals (or sear in a very hot pan) until medium-rare, about 3 to 4 minutes a side, depending on thickness. Let rest 5 minutes, slice thinly against the grain and reserve.

recipeInstructions.name: While steak rests, finish the salad:

itemListElement.text: combine mangoes, cilantro, basil and lime zest in a mixing bowl. Add half the dressing and toss. Add steak and peanuts and toss. Add more dressing to taste and serve.
